headline: A Look At Packaging Corporation Of America (PKG) Valuation After Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Packaging Corporation of America (PKG) has drawn fresh investor attention after recent trading, with the share price around $211.12. You might be weighing this packaging and paper producer against its longer term return profile. See our latest analysis for Packaging Corporation of America. The recent 1 day share price return of 2.37% and 1 month share price return of 6.37% suggest some short term momentum. However, the 1 year total shareholder return shows a 4.68% decline, which contrasts...
